overview: What do you do when you get the "seven year itch" and the sex between you and that hung husband of yours begins to fade just a bit? You find someone else's hung husband and start to have fresh, new, exciting, butt pounding sex on the sly. Or, you find a young, hung cute stud to introduce into your relationship and fuck the hell out of him by the pool. And, that is exactly what happens in Hung House Husbands.
title: Hung House Husbands
